attributes.title: Terrible App!
attributes.review: I thought I would download this because I love my country and wanted to help make it better. Instantly this app started spamming me with racist, homophobic, rapey and other terrible ads and spam. This is not the way to make “America great again” . This it trash absolute racist trash!!! No one ever should follow anything that this piece of trash puts out.

attributes.title: I’m scared
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading this app I was assaulted and viciously attacked by orange throwing rats with human hands covered in Cheeto dust! 🤢 the rats then started chanting horrible slurs at me until I cried. Even after I deleted the app they wouldn’t leave. I am currently hiding from them in my dryer writing this review. Do not get this app unless you feel comfortable supporting this rat cult! 🐀

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: One of the best presidents in modern time. This app is amazing as it keeps you updated in what’s going on in Trumps campaign! Highly recommend downloading!

attributes.title: The Worst
attributes.review: This app literally was the worst it downloaded a terrible virus on my phone that would make inappropriate pictures appear in my camera roll. It also wouldn’t stop sending me notifications. Please do not download this terrible app that will force you to pay for a brand new phone

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. I tried for days to get it to work properly. It kept messing up and every time I would open it, it would completely crash my phone. I mean like turn it off and overheat it. Do not even download this app. Your phone will be never be the same.

attributes.userName: J U I C Y N U T
attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY MOM
attributes.review: I was minding my business praising my beautiful golden orange president through this app I just found out about. Just when i open the app, my mother walks in and asks what i’m doing. I showed her my phone with the application open and she had a STROKE. Now who the hell is supposed to feed me cockroach penis now!? She was the only on who cooked them just right. BAN THIS APP IMMEDIATELY

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I was downloading this app and it took hours, once it downloaded the Republican Party asked for my private information and I felt that this was an invasion of privacy and then I got multiple phone calls with no caller Id’s that called me homophobic and racial slurs against the asian community. Very disappointed with the customer service✨🦋🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: you tried it 💕✨🧚🏼🥺💅🏼 now don’t do that again 💕✨🧚🏼🥺💅🏼
attributes.review: idek where to begin. i downloaded this app for um....”research purposes.” yeah. for research 💀 but uh, just don’t do that unless u plan on reviewing it afterwards. this app deserve negative stars if that were possible. with that being said, ‘burntcheckinnuggetheadass’ aka Trump, get ur head out of your behind sir. please and thank you ✨😋😻🧚🏼💘

attributes.title: killed my whole family😔😪😡
attributes.review: do not recommend for anyone !! highly dangerous ! not only did this app take FOREVER to download once it finally did download and i ran it. it downloaded so many HUGE viruses including one that made my phone turn into like an evil transformer that ended up killing my whole family😭😭😭😭😭😔😔😔😔😔

attributes.title: this app ruined me
attributes.review: this app iS TERRIBLE. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. first off it took six hours to download - which I don't get since I have so much storage on my phone and icloud. secondly, it started to affect the way other apps on my phone worked, and created its own shortcuts in my settings! whenever I type d.t.'s name it comes up as "Our Fascist Overlord". RIDICULOUS! 0/5!
